00013 void EPOS::dynamicCallback(epos_manager::epos_managerConfig &config, uint32_t level){
00014         if(isInitialized){
00015                 if(currentConfig.Position_Profile_Velocity!=config.Position_Profile_Velocity){
00016                         setPositionProfileVelocity(config.Position_Profile_Velocity);
00017                 }
00018                 if(currentConfig.Position_Profile_Deceleration!=config.Position_Profile_Deceleration){
00019                         setPositionProfileDeceleration(config.Position_Profile_Deceleration);
00020                 }
00021                 if(currentConfig.Position_Profile_Acceleration!=config.Position_Profile_Acceleration){
00022                         setPositionProfileAcceleration(config.Position_Profile_Acceleration);
00023                 }
00024                 if(currentConfig.Velocity_Profile_Acceleration!=config.Velocity_Profile_Acceleration){
00025                         setVelocityProfileAcceleration(config.Velocity_Profile_Acceleration);
00026                 }
00027                 if(currentConfig.Velocity_Profile_Deceleration!=config.Velocity_Profile_Deceleration){
00028                         setVelocityProfileDeceleration(config.Velocity_Profile_Deceleration);
00029                 }
00030                 if(currentConfig.Disable_Motor!=config.Disable_Motor){
00031                         clearFaults();
00032                         setEnableState(!config.Disable_Motor);
00033                 }
00034                 if(currentConfig.Reinitialize_Motor != config.Reinitialize_Motor
00035                                 && config.Reinitialize_Motor == true){
00036                         if(reinitialize()) setEnableState(true);
00037                 }
00038 
00039         }
00040         currentConfig = config;
00041 }

00043 EPOS::EPOS(ros::NodeHandle _nh):server(_nh) {
00044         maxCommandAttempts = 5;
00045         errorCode = 0;
00046         nh = _nh;
00047         isInitialized=false;
00048         callbackManager = boost::bind(&EPOS::dynamicCallback, this, _1 ,_2);
00049         server.setCallback(callbackManager);
00050 }

00053 bool EPOS::reinitialize() {
00054         if(!clearFaults())
00055                 return false;
00056         if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Name"))
00057                 nh.getParam("Motor_Name", motorName);
00058         if(!setEnableState(false))
00059                 return false;
00061         if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Type")){
00062                 nh.getParam("Motor_Type", motorType);
00063                 if(!setMotorType(motorType)) return false;
00064         }
00065         else {
00066                 loadMotorTypeFromEpos();
00067                 if(!setMotorType(motorType))return false;
00068         }
00069         switch(motorType){
00070                 case MT_DC_MOTOR:
00071                         if(nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current") && nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current") && nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant")){
00072                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Nominal_Current", motorNominalCurrent);
00073                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Max_Current", motorMaxCurrent);
00074                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant", motorThermalTimeConstant);
00075                                 if(!setDCMotorParameters(motorNominalCurrent,motorMaxCurrent,motorThermalTimeConstant))return false;
00076                         }
00077                         else if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current") || nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current") || nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant")){
00078                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current"))
00079                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Nominal_Current", motorNominalCurrent);
00080                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current"))
00081                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Max_Current", motorMaxCurrent);
00082                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant"))
00083                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant", motorThermalTimeConstant);
00084                                 if(!setDCMotorParameters(motorNominalCurrent,motorMaxCurrent,motorThermalTimeConstant))return false;
00085                         }
00086                         break;
00087                 case MT_EC_BLOCK_COMMUTATED_MOTOR:
00088                         if(nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current") && nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current") && nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant")&& nh.hasParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs")){
00089                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Nominal_Current", motorNominalCurrent);
00090                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Max_Current", motorMaxCurrent);
00091                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant", motorThermalTimeConstant);
00092                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs", motorNumberPolePairs);
00093                                 if(!setECMotorParameters(motorNominalCurrent,motorMaxCurrent,
00094                                         motorThermalTimeConstant,motorNumberPolePairs)) return false;
00095                         }
00096                         else if(nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current") || nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current") || nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant") || nh.hasParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs")){
00097                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current"))
00098                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Nominal_Current", motorNominalCurrent);
00099                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current"))
00100                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Max_Current", motorMaxCurrent);
00101                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant"))
00102                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant", motorThermalTimeConstant);
00103                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs"))
00104                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs", motorNumberPolePairs);
00105                                 if(!setECMotorParameters(motorNominalCurrent,motorMaxCurrent,
00106                                         motorThermalTimeConstant,motorNumberPolePairs)) return false;
00107                         }
00108                         break;
00109                 case MT_EC_SINUS_COMMUTATED_MOTOR:
00110                         if(nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current") && nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current") && nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant")&& nh.hasParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs")){
00111                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Nominal_Current", motorNominalCurrent);
00112                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Max_Current", motorMaxCurrent);
00113                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant", motorThermalTimeConstant);
00114                                 nh.getParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs", motorNumberPolePairs);
00115                                 if(!setECMotorParameters(motorNominalCurrent,motorMaxCurrent,
00116                                         motorThermalTimeConstant,motorNumberPolePairs)) return false;
00117                         }
00118                         else if(nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current") || nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current") || nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant") || nh.hasParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs")){
00119                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Nominal_Current"))
00120                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Nominal_Current", motorNominalCurrent);
00121                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Max_Current"))
00122                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Max_Current", motorMaxCurrent);
00123                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant"))
00124                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant", motorThermalTimeConstant);
00125                                 if (nh.hasParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs"))
00126                                         nh.getParam("Motor_Number_Pole_Pairs", motorNumberPolePairs);
00127                                 if(!setECMotorParameters(motorNominalCurrent,motorMaxCurrent,
00128                                         motorThermalTimeConstant,motorNumberPolePairs)) return false;
00129                         }
00130                         break;
00131                 default: ROS_ERROR_STREAM("No Valid Motor Parameters Available");
00132         }
00133

00137         if(nh.hasParam("Sensor_Type")){
00138                 nh.getParam("Sensor_Type", sensorType);
00139                 if(!setSensorType(sensorType))return false;
00140         }
00141         else{

00195                 }

00350                                 nh.getParam("QuickStop_Pin",quickstopPin);
00351                                 setQuickstop(quickstopPin,true,false);
00352                         }
00353                 }
00354         }
00355

00357                 return false;
00358 
00359         isInitialized = true;
00360         if(motorName.size())
00361                 ROS_INFO_STREAM(motorName << " Successfully Initialized");
00362         else
00363                 ROS_INFO("Motor %d %s", nodeID, " Successfully Initialized");
00364         return true;
00365 }

00368 bool EPOS::initializeMotor(void* keyHandle){
00369         nodeID=-1;
00370         if(keyHandle==0){
00371                 ROS_ERROR("Keyhandle Not Initialized. Please Inititialize Keyhandle");
00372                 return false;
00373         }
00374         this->keyHandle = keyHandle;
00375 
00376         if (nh.hasParam("Node_ID")) nh.getParam("Node_ID", nodeID);
00377         else {
00378                 ROS_ERROR("Must specify Node ID");
00379                 return false;
00380         }
00381         if(!reinitialize())return false;
00382         if(!setEnableState(true))
00383                 return false;
00384         return true;
00385 
00386 }

00401 
00402 bool EPOS::setVelocity(long int setpoint){
00403         if(!isInitialized){
00404                 if(motorName.size())
00405                         ROS_WARN_STREAM(motorName <<  " is not Initialized. Cannot set velocity");
00406                 else
00407                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " is not Initialized. Cannot set velocity");
00408                 return false;
00409         }
00410         getState();
00411         switch(state){
00412                 case ST_DISABLED:
00413                         if(motorName.size())
00414                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM(motorName <<  " is not Enabled. Cannot set velocity");
00415                         else
00416                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " is not Enabled. Cannot set velocity");
00417                         return false;
00418                 case ST_QUICKSTOP:
00419                         if(motorName.size())
00420                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM(motorName <<  " is in QuickStop. Cannot set velocity");
00421                         else
00422                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " is in QuickStop. Cannot set velocity");
00423                         return false;
00424                 case ST_FAULT:
00425                         if(motorName.size())
00426                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM(motorName <<  " is in Fault State. Cannot set velocity");
00427                         else
00428                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " is in Fault State. Cannot set velocity");
00429                         printFaults();
00430                         return false;
00431                 case ST_ENABLED:
00432                         if(setpoint > maxProfileVelocity){
00433                                 ROS_WARN("Desired velocity higher than maximum, reducing to %d",maxProfileVelocity);
00434                                 setpoint=maxProfileVelocity;
00435                         }
00436                         if(!activateProfileVelocityMode())return false;
00437                         if(!moveWithVelocity(setpoint))return false;
00438                         return true;
00439                 default:
00440                         return false;
00441         }
00442 
00443 
00444 }
00445 
00446 
00447 bool EPOS::setPosition(long int setpoint, bool absolute, bool immediately){
00448         if(!isInitialized){
00449                 if(motorName.size())
00450                         ROS_WARN_STREAM(motorName <<  " is not Initialized. Cannot set position");
00451                 else
00452                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " is not Initialized. Cannot set position");
00453                 return false;
00454         }
00455         getState();
00456         switch(state){
00457                 case ST_DISABLED:
00458                         if(motorName.size())
00459                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM(motorName <<  " is not Enabled. Cannot set position");
00460                         else
00461                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " is not Enabled. Cannot set position");
00462                         return false;
00463                 case ST_QUICKSTOP:
00464                         if(motorName.size())
00465                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM(motorName <<  " is in QuickStop. Cannot set position");
00466                         else
00467                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " is in QuickStop. Cannot set position");
00468                         return false;
00469                 case ST_FAULT:
00470                         if(motorName.size())
00471                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM(motorName <<  " is in Fault State. Cannot set position");
00472                         else
00473                                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " is in Fault State. Cannot set position");
00474                         printFaults();
00475                         return false;
00476                 case ST_ENABLED:
00477                         if(!activateProfilePositionMode())return false;
00478                         if(!moveToPosition(setpoint,(int)absolute,(int)immediately))return false;
00479                         return true;
00480                 default:
00481                         return false;
00482         }
00483 }
00484 
00485 bool EPOS::setEnableState(bool enabled){
00486         int loopCounter=0;
00487         if (enabled){
00488                 while (!VCS_SetEnableState(keyHandle, nodeID, &errorCode)) {
00489                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts) {
00490                                 if(motorName.size())
00491                                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not enable " << motorName);
00492                                 else
00493                                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not enable motor " << nodeID <<": " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00494                                 return false;
00495                         }
00496                 }
00497         }
00498         else {
00499                 while (!VCS_SetDisableState(keyHandle, nodeID, &errorCode)) {
00500                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00501                                 if(motorName.size())
00502                                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not disable " << motorName << ": " <<getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00503                                 else
00504                                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not disable motor " << nodeID <<": " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00505                                 return false;
00506                         }
00507                 }
00508         }
00509         isEnabled = enabled;
00510         return true;
00511 }
00512 
00513 bool EPOS::setPositionProfile(int positionProfileVelocity,int positionProfileAcceleration,int positionProfileDeceleration){
00514         if(positionProfileVelocity>maxProfileVelocity) {
00515                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Desired Position Profile Velocity is greater than Maximum Velocity. " <<
00516                                 "Setting desired Position Profile Velocity to " << maxProfileVelocity);
00517                 positionProfileVelocity=maxProfileVelocity;
00518         }
00519 
00520         if(positionProfileAcceleration>maxAcceleration){
00521                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Desired Position Profile Acceleration is greater than Maximum Acceleration. " <<
00522                                 "Setting desired Position Profile Acceleration to " << maxAcceleration);
00523                 positionProfileAcceleration=maxAcceleration;
00524         }
00525 
00526         if(positionProfileDeceleration>maxAcceleration){
00527                 ROS_WARN_STREAM("Desired Position Profile Deceleration is greater than Maximum Deceleration. " <<
00528                                 "Setting desired Position Profile Deceleration to " << maxAcceleration);
00529                 positionProfileDeceleration=maxAcceleration;
00530         }
00531 
00532         if(!setEnableState(false))return false;
00533 
00534         int loopCounter=0;
00535         while(!VCS_SetPositionProfile(keyHandle, nodeID, positionProfileVelocity, positionProfileAcceleration, positionProfileDeceleration, &errorCode)){
00536                 if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00537                         if(motorName.size())
00538                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set " << motorName << " Position Profile: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00539                         else
00540                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set motor " << nodeID <<" Position Profile: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00541                         return false;
00542                 }
00543         }
00544 
00545         if(!saveParameters())return false;
00546 
00547         if(!setEnableState(true))return false;
00548 
00549         nh.setParam("Position_Profile_Velocity",positionProfileVelocity);
00550         this->positionProfileVelocity=positionProfileVelocity;
00551         nh.setParam("Position_Profile_Acceleration",positionProfileAcceleration);
00552         this->positionProfileAcceleration=positionProfileAcceleration;
00553         nh.setParam("Position_Profile_Deceleration",positionProfileDeceleration);
00554         this->positionProfileDeceleration=positionProfileDeceleration;
00555 
00556         return true;
00557 }

00621 bool EPOS::getPosition(long* position){
00622         int loopCounter=0;
00623         while (!VCS_GetPositionIs(keyHandle, nodeID, position, &errorCode)) {
00624                 if(motorName.size())
00625                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Could not grab " << motorName << " Position. Retrying...");
00626                 else
00627                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Could not grab motor " << nodeID <<" Position. Retrying... ");
00628                 if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts) {
00629                         if(motorName.size())
00630                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get " << motorName << " Position: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00631                         else
00632                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get motor " << nodeID <<" Position: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00633                         return false;
00634                 }
00635         }
00636         return true;
00637 }

00643                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Could not grab " << motorName << " Velocity. Retrying...");

00650                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get motor " << nodeID <<" Velocity: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00651                         return false;

00653         }

00676 bool EPOS::getEnableState(bool* enabled){
00677         int isEnabled;
00678         int loopCounter=0;
00679         while (!VCS_GetEnableState(keyHandle, nodeID, &isEnabled, &errorCode)) {
00680                 if(motorName.size())
00681                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Could not grab " << motorName << " Enable State. Retrying...");
00682                 else
00683                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Could not grab motor " << nodeID <<" Enable State. Retrying...");
00684 
00685                 if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts) {
00686                         if(motorName.size())
00687                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get " << motorName << " Enable State: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00688                         else
00689                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get motor " << nodeID <<" Enable State: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00690                         return false;
00691                 }
00692         }
00693         *enabled = (isEnabled == ST_ENABLED) ? true : false;
00694         return true;

00697 bool EPOS::clearFaults(){
00698         int loopCounter=0;
00699         while(!VCS_ClearFault(keyHandle, nodeID, &errorCode)){
00700                 if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00701                         if(motorName.size())
00702                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not Clear " << motorName << " Faults: "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00703                         else
00704                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not Clear motor " << nodeID <<" Faults: "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00705                         return false;
00706                 }
00707         }
00708         return true;
00709 }

00711 bool EPOS::isInFault(){
00712         int loopCounter=0;
00713         int isInFault;
00714 
00715         while (!VCS_GetFaultState(keyHandle, nodeID, &isInFault,&errorCode)) {
00716                 if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00717                         if(motorName.size())
00718                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get " << motorName << " Faults State: "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00719                         else
00720                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get motor " << nodeID <<" Fault State : "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00721                         isFaulted=true;
00722                         return true;
00723                 }
00724         }
00725         if(isInFault==1){
00726                 isFaulted=true;
00727                 return true;
00728         }
00729         else {
00730                 isFaulted=false;
00731                 return false;
00732         }
00733 }
00734 
00735 bool EPOS::printFaults(){
00736         int loopCounter=0;
00737         unsigned char numErrors;
00738         unsigned long functionErrorCode = 0;
00739         unsigned long deviceErrorCode = 0;
00740 
00741         while (!VCS_GetNbOfDeviceError(keyHandle, nodeID, &numErrors,&errorCode)) {
00742                 if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00743                         if(motorName.size())
00744                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get number of " << motorName << " Faults: "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00745                         else
00746                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get number of motor " << nodeID <<" Faults : "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00747                         return false;
00748                 }
00749         }
00750         loopCounter=0;
00751 
00752         for(unsigned char errorNumber = 1; errorNumber <= numErrors; errorNumber++){
00753                 while (!VCS_GetDeviceErrorCode(keyHandle, nodeID, errorNumber, &deviceErrorCode, &functionErrorCode)) {
00754                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00755                                 if(motorName.size())
00756                                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get " << motorName << " Fault Codes: "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00757                                 else
00758                                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get  motor " << nodeID <<" Fault Codes: "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00759                                 return false;
00760                         }
00761                 }
00762                 if(deviceErrorCode >0){
00763                         if(motorName.size())
00764                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM(motorName << " in fault state. Device Error: " << getErrorInfo(deviceErrorCode).c_str());
00765                         else
00766                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " in fault state. Device Error: " << getErrorInfo(deviceErrorCode).c_str());
00767                 }
00768                 if(functionErrorCode >0){
00769                         if(motorName.size())
00770                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM(motorName << " in fault state. Function Error: " << getErrorInfo(functionErrorCode).c_str());
00771                         else
00772                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Motor " << nodeID << " in fault state. Function Error: " << getErrorInfo(functionErrorCode).c_str());
00773                 }
00774         }
00775         return true;
00776 }

00778 bool EPOS::isEPOSInitialized(){
00779         return isInitialized;
00780 }

00782 bool EPOS::getState(){
00783         int loopCounter=0;
00784         while(!VCS_GetState(keyHandle,nodeID,&state,&errorCode)){
00785                 if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00786                         if(motorName.size())
00787                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get " << motorName << " State: "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00788                         else
00789                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not get motor " << nodeID <<" State: "<< getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00790                         return false;
00791                 }
00792         }
00793         return true;
00794 
00795 }
